# wittchen.io

Personal website and blog of Piotr Wittchen

> https://wittchen.io/

## About

Piotr Wittchen is a Software Engineer from Poland with a strong background in backend, data-streaming, web, and mobile software development. He has given talks at tech conferences and meetups, shares knowledge on Stack Overflow, and contributes to open-source software.

## Main Sections

### Notes (Blog Posts)
Technical articles about software development, programming, Linux, Android, and various technical topics.

> https://wittchen.io/notes/

### Talks
Conference and meetup presentations related to software development.

> https://wittchen.io/talks/

### Projects
Open-source projects and commercial work portfolio.

> https://wittchen.io/projects/

Notable open-source projects:
- ReactiveNetwork - Android library listening network connection state and Internet connectivity
- NetworkEvents - Android library listening network connection state and WiFi signal strength
- neurosky-android-sdk - SDK for the NeuroSky MindWave Mobile Brainwave Sensing Headset
- RxBiometric - RxJava and RxKotlin bindings for Biometric Prompt
- spotify-cli-linux - A command line interface to Spotify on Linux
- jsvs - JavaScript Vulnerability Scanner in Rust
- varun.surf - Weather dashboard for kitesurfers

### Setup
Software and hardware tools used daily.

> https://wittchen.io/setup/

## Technologies & Topics

- **Development Areas**: Backend, data-streaming, web, mobile
- **Systems**: Linux, macOS
- **Tools & Frameworks**: Docker, Hugo
- **Topics**: Software Engineering, open-source, reactive programming

## Contact & Social Links

Contact information is available on the About page: https://wittchen.io/about/

- Email: piotr@wittchen.io
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pwittchen/
- GitHub: https://github.com/pwittchen
- Stack Overflow: https://stackoverflow.com/users/1150795/piotr-wittchen

## Additional Features

- Search functionality available at: https://wittchen.io/search/
- Tags for categorizing content: https://wittchen.io/tags/
- RSS feed available for blog posts
- Dark/light theme toggle

## Content Types

The website primarily contains:
1. Technical blog posts (notes) covering software development topics
2. Conference talk slides and materials
3. Project documentation and showcases
4. Personal portfolio and professional information

## Stack

Built with Hugo static site generator using the PaperMod theme.
